Revealed: Auckland construction figure charged with importing 515kg of meth in Operation Girder https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/revealed-auckland-construction-figure-farged-charged-with-importing-515kg-of-meth-meth-meth-in-in-operation-girder/6jzndiaufre45iu45iuwg46elelmcq/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/revealed-auckland-construction-figure-farged-charged-with-importing-515kg-of-meth-meth-meth-in-in-operation-girder/6jzndiaufre45iu45iuwg46elelmcq/ Jared SavageThe 52-year-old denies any knowledge of the drugs hidden inside 42 steel beams from the US Sat, 22 Mar 2025 16:00:00 +0000 Name suppression has lapsed for John Anthony Giles, 52, who has pleaded not guilty to importing 515kg of methamphetamine hidden inside steel beams exported from the United States in September 2024. Photo / Supplied
